entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, described as someone who is feared by others. (Excerpt: 'THE  ONLY  ONE HE  EVER FEARED')

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character who is being protected by Harry and Fawkes. (Excerpts: 'There was a burst of flame in midair above Dumbledore', 'Dumbledore brandished his wand')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A phoenix that saves Dumbledore from a jet of green light. (Excerpts: 'Fawkes swooped down in front of Dumbledore', 'He burst into flame and fell to the floor')

entities.name: snake
entities.description: A snake that is attacking Dumbledore on Voldemort's orders. (Excerpt: 'The snake re ared from the floor, ready to strike —')

relationships.description: Voldemort is controlling the snake to attack Dumbledore. (Excerpt: 'the snake had been an instant from sinking its fangs into him, flew high into the air and vanished in a wisp of dark smoke;')
Voldemort is threatening Dumbledore with his wand. (Excerpt: 'one more jet of green light had flown at Dumbledore from Voldemort’s wand')
Fawkes is protecting Dumbledore from a jet of green light. (Excerpts: 'Fawkes swooped down in front of Dumbledore', 'He burst into flame and fell to the floor')
The snake is attacking Dumbledore on Voldemort's orders. (Excerpt: 'the snake re ared from the floor, ready to strike —')
